imdb.plot outline: Hosts assume the role of secret agents, going undercover on the streets of KL looking for recipes. They interact with stall operators and cooks, trying to get them to share their secrets. Zher and Malcolm, armed with his clipboard, rush back to the Kitchen. With the assistance of Zher and his students, will Chef Malcolm, who is trained in French cuisine, be able to replicate the tried and tested recipes?
imdb.title: Back to the Streets
plot: Malcolm and Zher go out onto the streets of KL undercover seeing if they can steal recipes to bring back to Chef Malcolms kitchen so he can re-create and make them his own.::Steve Wee

Hosts assume the role of secret agents, going undercover on the streets of KL looking for recipes. They interact with stall operators and cooks, trying to get them to share their secrets. Zher and Malcolm, armed with his clipboard, rush back to the Kitchen. With the assistance of Zher and his students, will Chef Malcolm, who is trained in French cuisine, be able to replicate the tried and tested recipes?::Bryan Foo
